getWasLaunched().Description: Returns whether the application was freshly launched.

getSessionId().Description: Returns the current application's session ID.

ClassDesc: When a connection to a receiver application has been established, this object contains information about that application, including its @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#ApplicationMetadata_E@ and current status. If the connection fails, then all values except getStatus() will be invalid.
